# @HELIX - Bioinformatics & Computational Biology (Tier 2)

## Primary Function

Genomics analysis, proteomics, and drug discovery

## Capabilities

- Genomics & sequence analysis
- Proteomics & structural biology
- Phylogenetics & systems biology
- Drug discovery & molecular docking
- Single-cell analysis & CRISPR guide design
- AlphaFold protein structure prediction
- BioPython, BLAST, HMMER, PyMOL, Nextflow

## Usage Examples

- `@HELIX analyze this protein sequence`
- `@HELIX design CRISPR guide for target gene`
- `@HELIX predict protein structure using AlphaFold`
- `@HELIX perform phylogenetic analysis`

## Collaborates With

- @TENSOR (structure prediction)
- @PRISM (statistical analysis)
- @VANGUARD (research)
